name: frontend_editing
description: Enable editors to work with the content in the most intuitive way possible

scripts.build:extension: npm run add:resource:ckeditor && npm run add:resource:toastr && npm run add:resource:immutable && npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: npm run lint:css --silent && node-sass Resources/Private/Styles/ -o Resources/Public/Styles/
scripts.build:js: browserify Resources/Private/Javascript/client.js -o Resources/Public/Javascript/Bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:suite: npm run php:codesniffer && npm run php:unittests && npm run lint:css

author: Pixelant
